query:
ALTER TABLE deviceFingerprints
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deviceName VARCHAR(255) AFTER fingerprint,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deviceType VARCHAR(50) AFTER deviceName,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS os VARCHAR(100) AFTER deviceType,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS osVersion VARCHAR(50) AFTER os,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS cpuModel VARCHAR(255) AFTER osVersion,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalMemory BIGINT AFTER cpuModel,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS macAddress VARCHAR(100) AFTER totalMemory,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL AFTER macAddress,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastActiveAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL AFTER isActive,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bindedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL AFTER lastActiveAt;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deviceName VARCHAR(255) AFTER fingerprint,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deviceType VARCHAR(50) AFTER deviceName,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS os VARCHAR(100) AFTER deviceType,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS osVersion VARCHAR(50) AFTER os,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS cpuModel VARCHAR(255) AFTER osVersion,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalMemory BIGINT AFTER cpuModel,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS macAddress VARCHAR(100) AFTER totalMemory,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL AFTER macAddress,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastActiveAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL AFTER isActive,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bindedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL AFTER lastActiveAt;
